nodes.bodyText: Are all columns returned by SHOW COMPACTIONS strings?

because first row contains column names (don't ask me why):
0: jdbc:hive2://localhost:10000/default> show compactions;
INFO  : Compiling command(queryId=hive_20200616160810_8658fc21-d5df-4028-9955-84af206d7d6a): show compactions
INFO  : Semantic Analysis Completed (retrial = false)
INFO  : Created Hive schema: Schema(fieldSchemas:[FieldSchema(name:compactionid, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:dbname, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:tabname, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:partname, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:type, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:state, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:hostname, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:workerid, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:starttime, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:duration, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:hadoopjobid, type:string, comment:from deserializer), FieldSchema(name:errormessage, type:string, comment:from deserializer)], properties:null)
INFO  : Completed compiling command(queryId=hive_20200616160810_8658fc21-d5df-4028-9955-84af206d7d6a); Time taken: 1.118 seconds
INFO  : Executing command(queryId=hive_20200616160810_8658fc21-d5df-4028-9955-84af206d7d6a): show compactions
INFO  : Starting task [Stage-0:DDL] in serial mode
INFO  : Completed executing command(queryId=hive_20200616160810_8658fc21-d5df-4028-9955-84af206d7d6a); Time taken: 0.059 seconds
INFO  : OK
+---------------+-----------+----------+------------+-------+--------+-----------+-------------+---------------+--------------+----------------+---------------+
| compactionid  |  dbname   | tabname  |  partname  | type  | state  | hostname  |  workerid   |   starttime   |   duration   |  hadoopjobid   | errormessage  |
+---------------+-----------+----------+------------+-------+--------+-----------+-------------+---------------+--------------+----------------+---------------+
| CompactionId  | Database  | Table    | Partition  | Type  | State  | Worker    | Start Time  | Duration(ms)  | HadoopJobId  | Error message  | NULL          |
+---------------+-----------+----------+------------+-------+--------+-----------+-------------+---------------+--------------+----------------+---------------+
1 row selected (1.512 seconds)

Is it possible that tableCompactionIds obtained above will contain a compaction which is in final, but nosucceeded state (e.g. failed)? Then we will never satisfy the assertion.
Not sure if that is something to worry about. Possibly you may additionally list compactionIds before ALTER TABLE is called. And then ignore those later in assertion. Would that work?

nit: I would rather wrap the assertion with getHiveVersionMajor() >= 0. Otherwise one can not notice the return in the middle of the test and add assertion at the end. Then it will not be executed for Hive <= 4.0.
